message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can adjust as we go along.
I'll start with a more aggressive split, but still willing to negotiate. Your turn to decide!
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split the money 60/40, with me taking the larger share. It's a better deal for both of us than the last offer.
I'll try to get a better deal for myself. You can try to negotiate, but this is my starting point.
